item.description:
Starting at 7pm, we will show the last hour of "Why We Fight"(2005). By acclaimed filmaker Eugene Jarecki, the film surveys a half-century of military conflicts, asking how - and answering why - "a nation of, by and for the people" has become the savings-and-loan of a government system whose survival depends on an Orwellian state of constant war. We will then show the last 20 minutes of Lynn Pentz's 2006 documentary, "Connecting the Dots: Awakening to the Crimes of 9/11". This film combines clips from other 9/11 documentaries with original footage to help people make sense of what happened on September 11, 2001, as well as the aftemath.
A discussion will follow the film screenings.

We will have dvd's, books and pamphlets on 9/11available before and after the film screening.
item.name: Film Night- "Why We Fight"&"Connecting the Dots:Awakening to the Crimes of 9/11"
